73fa5e48-6051-43f8-8341-993ec9c29392.Text: Lives are spent freely on the battlefields of the Imperium, but they are not wasted. A soldier who can take back up their lasgun is more valuable than one bleeding out in the mud. Tending to survivable injuries and relieving those whose wounds are not is the task of the Medicae. These driven battlefield chiurgeons carry an array of wound treatments and combat drugs which have returning soldiers to the line as their only purpose - long term outcomes are beyond their charge.

f0dcfaba-a9f0-4541-8f0b-6e93260b66ee.Text: The medicae heals an adjacent ally for (Medicae/4)+(Medicae/10) hit points.

a9dc0584-1581-4871-837e-3d7eabe0001e.Text: An adjacent downed ally is brought back to action with 10% of their maximum hit points.

44cfb36b-b25a-4b68-a7ab-1cdc6fd56a2d.Text: This servoskull may heal any ally within 6 cells for (Medicae/4)+(Tech Use/10) hit points.

35186455-991c-46c0-a5f4-7c995f3a881b.Text: heals all allies 50% of max hp

9866dd54-0275-49fa-9d9a-67c99ef0ae11.Text: heals all allies 50% but damages medic 50%

243c7eb1-6120-4484-8f74-3ba138be87f3.Text: u4 - adds a 10% boost to medicae for the rest of the combat

ce5ada95-dabc-413d-a1cd-7c28ee45fef4.Text: t1 - 50% chance to not use charge on medikit

6ec0424d-dd91-422a-a232-a300bcce636e.Text: t2 - Can use Int in place of Per

a66c4390-cefa-40fc-b96c-bc93dc47667a.Text: t3 - medicae/10 bonus to crit chance with chain weapons

7a62c66b-925b-46db-9f2d-c93ec2e7e196.Text: t4 - chain melee hits cause medicae/5 levels of bleeding

7428ad04-2b28-4ee7-b9a6-3add68598fc7.Text: t5 - chain weapon damage bonus based on medicae instead of str

8f4f3500-fda1-4b7e-8675-732c751187c3.Text: t6 - +4 cell range bonus for servoskull

5b25c69f-011d-4ff3-a8f3-c6d7a49fa681.Text: t7 - To the rescue makes medicae lowest priority for one turn

1782299a-48e4-4e92-8dcb-3f506899c6d2.Text: t8 - adds 10% Medicae hp to resuscitate

d21a75bc-d75c-40fb-b9b3-eccda7c4f9dc.Text: t9 - Adds medicae/10 temp wounds to battlefield medicine healing

8fa1dc5a-3cd7-4dd7-85f2-bb3e29c25a45.Text: t10 - Panacea adds resistance bonus 10 for 3 rounds

375fb387-9404-4d51-bd81-b1281d6b2e7a.Text: t11 - battlefield medicine clears one injury

3aa4cdd3-9ed6-408b-8c40-ee8d2f6f2f2b.Text: t12 - ss inflicts 5 levels of toxin to one random target adjacent to ally healed

907ab6f0-f8ef-4011-a059-6b15c8919fe9.Text: t13 - melee adds toxin damage equal to carouse buff

009bdaad-0691-4e12-aaf8-3cdaa43cb624.Text: t14 - using keystone on self is 1 ap

cd76dcd7-6480-4b28-91d8-16b0a69b52fb.Text: t15 - adds perception bonus to initiative

c27f8746-3aa6-4582-86cc-0133037f5c70.Text: t16 - free mini turn if an ally dies once per turn

40d4babc-c800-4bbd-a69d-5d07f1322ba2.Text: t18 - healing buff when momentum is under 50

7ad5b5ee-fdde-4b2c-98f5-5fda80bf7037.Text: T19 - increase resolve by the number of medicae abilities known
